metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31743 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Firefox's HTML parser did not correctly interpret HTML comment tags,resulting in an incongruity with other browsers. This could have been usedto escape HTML comments on pages that put user-controlled data in them.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 101.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
